text: :point_up_2::skin-tone-2: this has now been added as an <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-css-async-option-to-module-s-meta-json-file/idi-p/412977|idea>. Please go upvote it!

Hi <@U3T21PDBK>, the code was recycled from a filter that was similar but very different with checkboxes but worked the same with HubDB. Very scattered, I think best approach would be from scratch as the logic doesnt transfer over 1:1.

I have the HubDB set up with the ID to the database, but for the 'locations__contains=1,2' I am unsure. Each individual member has a ID. I just want to mainly target the 'City' column but there is no ID on it.

I have the dropdown made its just not connected
that screenshot was a close up of the HubDB table on the data interested in
